description_bullets: Full-stack web development using modern technologies: HTML5, LESS, AngularJS, CoffeeScript, Ruby on Rails.
Working in a team-based development environment using agile methodologies like Kanban and Scrum.
Actively developing and maintaining the email marketing platform infomessage using Javascript (Vanilla, ES5), HTML5 and CSS3.
Responsible for the frontend development of 2 company websites: http://www.infomsg.com and http://www.infoset.com.tr
Doing both on-page and off-page SEO, website traffic growth. Also, translating the content from Turkish to English.
Currently building a new web application with 5 other team members.
Technologies used: PHP (Laravel), MySQL, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3
